How many people are affected by mal de Meleda ?,Mal de Meleda is a rare disorder; its prevalence is unknown. The disorder was first identified on the Croatian island of Mjlet (called Meleda in Italian) and has since been found in populations worldwide.,GHR,mal de Meleda
